sentences.en: I was wearing my tweed suit.
sentences.cn: 我那时穿着我的花呢套装。

sentences.en: Tweed is timeless, tactile and tough.
sentences.cn: 粗花呢从不过时，手感很好，结实耐磨。

sentences.en: Coco invented the little black dress, perfected a trademark scent-Chanel No. 5-and became famous for her tweed suits and quilted handbags.
sentences.cn: 可可发明了小黑裙，完善了香奈儿5号香水的商标，并以她的花呢套装和绗缝手袋而闻名。
